commit.message:
re PR c++/24277 (Boost causes ICE in build_c_cast, at cp/typeck.c:5231)

	PR c++/24277
	* pt.c (instantiate_decl): Call finish_static_data_member_decl for
	static data members.
	PR c++/24277
	* g++.dg/template/static20.C: New test.

From-SVN: r105228

files.patch:
@@ -1,5 +1,8 @@
